channel.title: Ultraviolet Grasslands: Beyond the Moon River
channel.description:
![EUnvwpcXkAMVRmV|690x483](upload://32FxUvUPZnh0PtSoDQHvV8aRjM7.jpeg) “Any road followed precisely to its end leads precisely nowhere. Climb the mountain just a little bit to test that it's a mountain. From the top of the mountain, you cannot see the mountain.” ― Frank Herbert, Dune
Ultraviolet Grasslands is a psychedelic metal setting by Luka Rejec about exploration, survival, drugs and resource management. This is a continuation of the adventures of the Cogflower Caravan on her journey to the Black City. New and returning players are equally welcome. We will be using Whitehack, a rules lite version of the world's most popular RPG. his event is scheduled to run for 3.5 hours. It will be recorded assuming all parties agree. There will be 3 sessions in July conveniently scheduled around GCOG. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html. We will be using [the X-Card](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1SB0jsx34bWHZWbnNIVVuMjhDkrdFGo1_hSC2BWPlI3A/edit) and other safety tools players suggest.
Session 1: [date=2020-07-04 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2020-07-04 time=21:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] Session 2: [date=2020-07-11 time=18:00:00 timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2020-07-11 time=21:30:00 timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] Session 3: [date=2020-07-25 time=18:00:00 timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2020-07-25 time=21:30:00 timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"]

“Any road followed precisely to its end leads precisely nowhere. Climb the mountain just a little bit to test that it’s a mountain. From the top of the mountain, you cannot see the mountain.”

Ultraviolet Grasslands is a psychedelic metal setting by Luka Rejec about exploration, survival, drugs and resource management.
This is a continuation of the adventures of the Cogflower Caravan on her journey to the Black City. New and returning players are equally welcome.
We will be using Whitehack, a rules lite version of the world’s most popular RPG.
his event is scheduled to run for 3.5 hours. It will be recorded assuming all parties agree.
There will be 3 sessions in July conveniently scheduled around GCOG. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.

This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html. We will be using the X-Card and other safety tools players suggest.

Session 1: Saturday, July 4, 2020 4:00 PM → Saturday, July 4, 2020 7:30 PM
